Class Projectile

  • java.lang.Object
    • Projectile

  • public class Projectile
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used for Character and Monster Projectile. A Projectile's Collision Mask is represented as a Square subdivided into 8 equal part in order to represent partial collision with other object or Character.
